channel.title: Need Team of people for my server/client
channel.description:
I'm designing a client/server for my website and I need it to be good so I need a few people to help me design it,
I need: (red is open; green is filled)
Somone who Is good at re-coloring items Somone experianced at client editing A Co-Server editer
these 4 people obviously get to be Co-Owners on the server and moderators on my websites forums, post here If your interested, and I'll contact you [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2008, 05:19:45 PM[/size][hr]So no one wants to help design my server/client?

item.title: Need Team of people for my server/client
item.dc:creator: @Pku_Skillz Pku Skillz
item.description:
@Pku_Skillz wrote:

I could help edit the server. Add Fight Caves, Barrows, even custom games if you’d like.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Team of people for my server/client
item.dc:creator: @scriptingbybrian scriptingbybrian
item.description:
@scriptingbybrian wrote:

scriptingbybrian:

…you think I don’t know java lol, I’m not the best but I’m still pretty dang good, I’ge people not becasue of inability but because of time… I’m probably just as good at scripting as you,

oh yeah, don’t be arrogant java isnt something you learn in a few days, takes years…
[/quote]

Not time to learn jave, time to make my server/client… not trying to be errogant I’ve just been scripting java for 1-2years…

Read full topic
